title: KiteboardingWays Kiteschool
description: KiteboardingWays offers everthing related to kiteboarding. Details about Kitelessons, Kite Safaris, Trainings and Kite gear rental. The website made with WordPress so it's easy to manage for the client.

title: Kite Visions
description: KiteVisions website introduces all of its services. Their main service is content creation for companies for the purpose of commercial photos or videos.
